name: Early Game Tips
description: Here are some early-game pointers to hopefully guide you through the roughish beginning of my modpack. You may find other easier ways to get through the initial first bit, but these are just general tips for others who may be having trouble.$(br2)$(italic)If youâ€™re still having trouble with something, feel free to $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://discord.gg/3fczkKP5aT) join our Discord$(/l)$()$(italic) and ask us any questions!
